title: openmpi fails with intel@17.0.1
body:
```
$ spack install -j1 openmpi@2.1.1%intel@17.0.1
==> xz is already installed in /home/certik/repos/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora25-x86_64/intel-17.0.1/xz-5.2.3-ajkczqbkmo76meocrthfrwnbup3aclzk
==> zlib is already installed in /home/certik/repos/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora25-x86_64/intel-17.0.1/zlib-1.2.11-27anjzuze64nyci6djr45njj4t2wjdz3
==> pkg-config is already installed in /home/certik/repos/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora25-x86_64/intel-17.0.1/pkg-config-0.29.2-iln5fu3hz6i5lrnmqerngwzsjz4a4zwu
==> Installing libxml2
==> Using cached archive: /home/certik/repos/spack/var/spack/cache/libxml2/libxml2-2.9.4.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /home/certik/repos/spack/var/spack/stage/libxml2-2.9.4-7x7qw2zw4yzxue3dbpbp34tajpzsxl7m/libxml2-2.9.4.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /home/certik/repos/spack/var/spack/stage/libxml2-2.9.4-7x7qw2zw4yzxue3dbpbp34tajpzsxl7m
==> No patches needed for libxml2
==> Building libxml2 [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make'

4 errors found in build log:
     [ ... ]
     1147  icc: command line warning #10006: ignoring unknown option '-Wredundant-decls'
     1148  ld: warning: libimf.so, needed by ./.libs/libxml2.so, not found (try using -rpath or -rpath-link)
     1149  ld: warning: libsvml.so, needed by ./.libs/libxml2.so, not found (try using -rpath or -rpath-link)
     1150  ld: warning: libirng.so, needed by ./.libs/libxml2.so, not found (try using -rpath or -rpath-link)
     1151  ld: warning: libintlc.so.5, needed by ./.libs/libxml2.so, not found (try using -rpath or -rpath-link)
     1152  ld: .libs/xmllint: hidden symbol `__intel_cpu_features_init_x' in /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2017.1.132/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin/libirc.a(cpu_feature_disp.o) is referenced by DSO
  >> 1153  ld: final link failed: Bad value
     1154  Makefile:1117: recipe for target 'xmllint' failed
  >> 1155  make[2]: *** [xmllint] Error 1
     1156  make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/certik/spack-stage/spack-stage-YzPtwr/libxml2-2.9.4'
     1157  Makefile:1440: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
  >> 1158  make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     1159  make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/certik/spack-stage/spack-stage-YzPtwr/libxml2-2.9.4'
     1160  Makefile:859: recipe for target 'all' failed
  >> 1161  make: *** [all] Error 2

See build log for details:
```
The relevant part of the log is at the end:
```
  CCLD     testdso.la
  CC       xmllint.o
icc: command line warning #10006: ignoring unknown option '-Wno-format-extra-args'
icc: command line warning #10006: ignoring unknown option '-Wcast-align'
icc: command line warning #10006: ignoring unknown option '-Waggregate-return'
icc: command line warning #10006: ignoring unknown option '-Wnested-externs'
icc: command line warning #10006: ignoring unknown option '-Wredundant-decls'
  CCLD     xmllint
icc: command line warning #10006: ignoring unknown option '-Wno-format-extra-args'
icc: command line warning #10006: ignoring unknown option '-Wcast-align'
icc: command line warning #10006: ignoring unknown option '-Waggregate-return'
icc: command line warning #10006: ignoring unknown option '-Wnested-externs'
icc: command line warning #10006: ignoring unknown option '-Wredundant-decls'
ld: warning: libimf.so, needed by ./.libs/libxml2.so, not found (try using -rpath or -rpath-link)
ld: warning: libsvml.so, needed by ./.libs/libxml2.so, not found (try using -rpath or -rpath-link)
ld: warning: libirng.so, needed by ./.libs/libxml2.so, not found (try using -rpath or -rpath-link)
ld: warning: libintlc.so.5, needed by ./.libs/libxml2.so, not found (try using -rpath or -rpath-link)
ld: .libs/xmllint: hidden symbol `__intel_cpu_features_init_x' in /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2017.1.132/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin/libirc.a(cpu_feature_disp.o) is referenced by DSO
ld: final link failed: Bad value
Makefile:1117: recipe for target 'xmllint' failed
make[2]: *** [xmllint] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/certik/spack-stage/spack-stage-YzPtwr/libxml2-2.9.4'
Makefile:1440: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/certik/spack-stage/spack-stage-YzPtwr/libxml2-2.9.4'
Makefile:859: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
```
